org.araneaframework.uilib.util
Class SelectControlUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.util.SelectControlUtil

public class SelectControlUtil
extends Object

Collection of methods used with SelectControls.

Author:
Martti Tamm (martti at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:

Method Detail

assertUnique

public static <T> void assertUnique(DisplayItemContainer<T> container)
Asserts whether the display item container contains unique items. If the uniqueness check fails, an exception will be thrown.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the display container.
Parameters:
container - The container of display items.

assertUnique

public static <T> void assertUnique(List<SelectGroup<T>> groups,
                                    T item)
Checks whether the item (that is not yet added to items) would not have an other item with the same value already in the items list.

If that constraint is violated, an assertion exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
groups - The display items of the control
item - An item to be added.

getItemValue

public static <T> String getItemValue(T item,
                                      String valueProperty)
Provides the value of the given item. The given property of the item will be called to retrieve the value.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the bean.
Parameters:
item - The bean containing the value.
valueProperty - The property of the item that provides the value.
Returns:
Either the value of the property when reading the property was successful, or null.

getItemsValues

public static <T> String[] getItemsValues(List<T> items,
                                          String valueProperty)
Provides the values of the given items. The given property of the items will be called to retrieve the values.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the bean.
Parameters:
items - The beans containing the values.
valueProperty - The property of the items that provides the value.
Returns:
An array of values, which are either the values of the property when reading the properties was successful, or nulls.

containsValue

public static <T> boolean containsValue(DisplayItemContainer<T> container,
                                        String value)
Provides whether the given container contains the given value among its items.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of container items.
Parameters:
container - The container of items to search.
value - The value to search for.
Returns:
A Boolean that is true when the container contains the given value among its items.

containsEnabledValue

public static <T> boolean containsEnabledValue(DisplayItemContainer<T> container,
                                               String value)
Provides whether the given container contains the given value among enabled items.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of container items.
Parameters:
container - The container of items to search.
value - The value to search for.
Returns:
A Boolean that is true when the container contains the given value among enabled items.

getSelectItem

public static <T> T getSelectItem(DisplayItemContainer<T> container,
                                  String value)
Returns an item from the given container by matching it to the given value.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of container items.
Parameters:
container - The container of items to search.
value - The value that defines which item should be returned.
Returns:
An item from the container, or null.

getEnabledSelectItem

public static <T> T getEnabledSelectItem(DisplayItemContainer<T> container,
                                         String value)
Returns an enabled item from the given container by matching it to the given value.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of container items.
Parameters:
container - The container of items to search.
value - The value that defines which item should be returned.
Returns:
An enabled item from the container, or null.

getSelectItems

public static <T> List<T> getSelectItems(DisplayItemContainer<T> container,
                                         String[] values)
Returns a subset of all items from the given container by matching them to the given values. The order of returned items will be the same as in the original list.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of container items.
Parameters:
container - The container of items to search.
values - The values that define, which items are allowed in the result list.
Returns:
A subset of items from the container, or null.

getEnabledSelectItems

public static <T> List<T> getEnabledSelectItems(DisplayItemContainer<T> container,
                                                String[] values)
Returns a subset of all enabled items from the given container by matching them to the given values. The order of returned items will be the same as in the original list.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of container items.
Parameters:
container - The container of items to search.
values - The values that define, which items are allowed in the result list.
Returns:
A subset of enabled items from the container, or null.

getValueIndex

public static <T> int getValueIndex(List<T> items,
                                    String valueProperty,
                                    String value)
Returns display item index by the specified value.

Parameters:
items - display items.
value - display item value.
Returns:
display item index by the specified value.

resolveGroupClass

public static <T> Class<T> resolveGroupClass(Class<T> itemClass,
                                             List<SelectGroup<T>> groups)
Resolves the class of type T. When itemClass is not null, it will be returned. Otherwise, when items is not empty, returns the class of its first item.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the class.
Parameters:
itemClass - The class of the item, or null.
groups - A list of items, which may be empty or even null.
Returns:
The resolved class.

resolveClass

public static <T> Class<T> resolveClass(Class<T> itemClass,
                                        List<T> items)
Resolves the class of type T. When itemClass is not null, it will be returned. Otherwise, when items is not empty, returns the class of its first item.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the class.
Parameters:
itemClass - The class of the item, or null.
items - A list of items, which may be empty or even null.
Returns:
The resolved class.
